title: Bug 17423 - Revert option appears twice in the popup menu
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: When the user right-clicks in the editor and opens the popup menu, there are two 'Revert' options listed.
EB: There should only be one 'Revert' option, and the duplicate should be disabled or removed to ensure there is no ambiguity.
SR: 1. Open the editor. 2. Make changes to the content to make the editor dirty. 3. Right-click anywhere in the editor. 4. Observe the contents of the popup menu and notice that there are two 'Revert' options.
